Title: Relates to a tax credit for the purchase of new and used electric vehicles
Summary: Establishes a tax credit for the purchase of new and used electric cars; provides that for a new electric vehicle, the tax credit shall be $7,500 and the tax credit for a used electric vehicle shall be $4,000.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a tax credit for the purchase of new and used electric vehicles
